body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div > span

text: Want to start your career in tech?
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > h2

text: Join our training program to become a software tester.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > p:nth-child(2)

text: The PLATO Software Tester Training program consists of five months of in-class training and a paid internship. Successful graduates are offered a full-time apprentice position with full benefits and paid vacation. Upon completion, they join the team as junior software testers.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > p:nth-child(3)

text: Our PLATO training program began in 2015 and has since trained more than 300 Indigenous software testers, many of whom still work for the company today in and around their home communities.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > p:nth-child(4)

text: The PLATO train-and-employ model is a unique approach to software testing training that combines classroom instruction with hands-on experience. Our program is designed to provide students with the skills and knowledge they need to succeed in the tech industry.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > p
body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > h3

text: Our classroom instruction is led by experienced software testers who are passionate about sharing their knowledge with students. We cover a wide range of topics, including software testing fundamentals, test automation, and agile methodologies.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > p
body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > h3

text: Our paid internship program provides students with the opportunity to apply their skills in a real-world setting. Students work on actual software testing projects, gaining valuable experience and building their professional network.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > p
body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > h3

text: Successful graduates of our program are offered a full-time apprentice position with PLATO. This is a unique opportunity to start a career in the tech industry with a company that is committed to diversity and inclusion.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > p

text: The PLATO training program is available to Indigenous people across Canada. We have training locations in several cities, and we also offer remote training options.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > p
body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > h3

text: Identify as First Nations (Status or Non-Status), Inuit, or Métis

text: Have a high school diploma or GED equivalent

text: Software testing is the process of evaluating and verifying that a software product or application does what it is supposed to do. The benefits of testing include preventing bugs, reducing development costs and improving performance.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > p

text: What does a software tester do?
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4 > span

text: Software testers are responsible for the quality of software development and deployment. They are involved in performing automated and manual tests to ensure the software created by developers is fit for purpose. Some of the duties they are responsible for include analysis of software, and systems, mitigate risk and prevent software issues.
selector_css: body > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > div > section:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > p

text: What are the benefits of the PLATO training program?
